meanings.definition: Combined resources or contributions from multiple sources.
meanings.sent1: The charity event resulted in a pooled fund to help those in need.
meanings.sent2: The pooled money from all the participants made a big difference.
meanings.sent3: The school's pooled resources allowed them to buy new books for the library.
meanings.sent4: The pooled efforts of the team led to a successful project completion.
meanings.sent5: The idea of a pooled donation box at the office was warmly welcomed by everyone.

meanings.definition: Gathered or collected together in a common location or container.
meanings.sent1: The pooled water in the basin reflected the sunlight beautifully.
meanings.sent2: The toys were all pooled together in a colorful bin.
meanings.sent3: The pooled snacks at the party disappeared quickly.
meanings.sent4: The pooled leaves in the yard created a vibrant carpet of colors.
meanings.sent5: The pooled ingredients in the pot created a delicious aroma in the kitchen.
